title: Gotta say, I legit love new Malz
body:
"It's like a whole new champ!"

I really like how his power was shifted from the ult towards the voidlings. Although I've played him jungle and he can clear every camp + dragon without his 1st back.... Just saying.

replies.body: Glad you're having fun. Repertoir might be looking to tone back the jungle clear. We'll see!

perhaps tone down the passive a bit??  its pretty op 
and if my memory serves right certain champions really suffered for having CC immunity.


just my 2 cents
The difference is that Malz doesn't control when he pops his CC immunity, the enemy does.
This is true. Use a soft CC first then bring the hard CC hammer down after about one second. Should do fine.
Just poke him with literally anything, wait a second, THEN burst his face off.
It doesn't even need to be CC. Just doing damage triggers it.

That is true as well. Forgot about that part.

Well, I saw a video about jungling with Malz before I tried him out and I knew almost immediately that his voidlings were gonna get nerfed and his passive most likely

I main malzahar but I have to admit that since malzahar has a safe lane (that's gonna get even safer with the E refreshing) that he would be pretty much untouchable most of the time and it would seem even less interactive now
Is new Malz better? Having a lot of success with him in ranked currently and I'm not a fan of the changes from what I've read.
Well he's very different now, so the likelyhood of you being to play him the same way you have is very unlikely.
